Competent.definition: having or showing requisite or adequate ability or qualities [a lawyer] [ representation by counsel] 2 a

1.definition: having or showing requisite or adequate ability or qualities [a lawyer] [ representation by counsel]

2 a.definition: free from addiction or mental defect that renders one incapable of taking care of oneself or one's property

sub_terms.b: capable of understanding one's position as a criminal defendant and the nature of the criminal proceedings and able to participate in one's defense compare,,

sub_terms.a: having the necessary power or authority [a judge of jurisdiction ""]
sub_terms.b: qualified for presentation in courtadmissible as evidence or capable of giving admissible evidence [a witness]
